alert.note: Alert for Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 4:02PM EDT until August 11 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL HORRY COUNTY... At 402 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Pawleys Island, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Little River, Springmaid Pier, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Little River Entrance, Horry, Loris, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Adrian, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, and Wampee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
